subsection.name: org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.xml.XMLStripper
subsection.p: Static utility class that converts HTML string to a text version of it. It has following methods:
subsection.source:
/** * Get HippoHTML content as text, i.e. parse it's inner HTML and add only * the content of the elements. */ String getHippoHTMLAsText(HippoHtml hippoHtml)
/** * Get an XML property as text, i.e. parse it and add only the content of * the elements. */ String getXMLPropertyAsText(Property property)
